data.message: Just saw your latest. You clearly said fuck me because who I voted for. Guess what douche bag?!?!?! Fuck your has-been ass too. Once was a fan. You should stick to music.

replies.message: Free Speech!

Yes man Free Speech is right. When someone says fuck you then you're entitled to say fuck you back. I don't give a rat's ass about what he said about Trump. I take him saying fuck you to his fans who voted a certain way personally. If you don't like it then fuck you too.
But but but Eminem is against the establishment government....oh wait....he sold out....bought by Hillary I guess.
The punk bitch was bought by somebody.
Truth hurts don't it, FUCK YOU !
